newsitem.title: SLOVENIA: Slovenia SBI index pressured down by BTC.
newsitem.headline: Slovenia SBI index pressured down by BTC.

text.p: Slovenia's SBI index ended marginally lower on Friday, weighed down by a four percent fall in warehouse and shopping centre operator BTC.

"Outlook of our market is really sad -- turnover is low and I don't think it'll get much better once foreigners return, because they will remain cautious regarding the stability of our market," said Karmen Cerar, a trader at brokerage Poteza.
* The SBI index fell 0.37 percent or 4.87 points to 1,318.47.
* BTC was the most active and the leading decliner, falling four percent to 14,400 tolars on volume of 1,000 shares. -- Ljubljana newsroom, 386-61-125-8439
